did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First Congregational Church of Eden records, 1817-1890.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: First Congregational Church of Eden (Eden, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Church meeting minutes; lists of members (1817-1840; baptisms (1817-1840); and marriages (1840-1841). Registers of baptisms (1841-1876); marriages (1841-1869); and members (1841-1883). Included are meeting minutes, miscellaneous legal documents, deeds (1833) and subscriptions (1865).

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: First Congregational Church of Eden (Eden, N.Y.)

controlaccess.head: Places:
controlaccess.geogname: Erie County (N.Y.) -- Religious life and customs.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Not to be published or otherwise released in such form that any individual mentioned in the records can be identified.
